tit.cmt: タイトルですので、カッコ内の補足は削除しました。Kokusaikaikan としました（京都市交通局のサイトより）。

sen.j: 国際会館駅（こくさいかいかんえき）は、京都府京都市左京区岩倉にある、京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の終着駅。
sen.e: Located in Iwakura, Sakyo Ward Kyoto, City Kyoto Prefecture, Kokusai Kaikan Station is a terminal on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Kokusai Station, located in Iwakura, Sakyo Ward Kyoto, City Kyoto Prefecture, is a terminal on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Kokusaikaikan Station, located in Iwakura, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto, City Kyoto Prefecture, is a terminal on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto Municipal Subway.
sen.cmt: Kokusaikaikan Station としました。City →municipal としました。

sen.j: 駅番号はK01。
sen.e: The station number is K01.
The station number is K01.
The station number is K01.

sen.j: 国立京都国際会館での第3回気候変動枠組条約締約国会議開催を機に開業した。
sen.e: Operation of this station started when Third Session of the Conference of the Parties was held at Kyoto International Conference Center.
The station became operational when the Third Session of the Conference of the Parties was held at Kyoto International Conference Center.
The station became operational when the Third Session of the Conference of the Parties was held at Kyoto International Conference Center.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: This station is located underground, with a platform serving two tracks.
The station is located underground, with a platform serving two tracks.
The station is located underground, with a platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: Only one entrance/exit gate place is provided.
Only one entrance/exit gate place is provided.
Only one ticket gate is provided.
sen.cmt: 改札→ticket gate としました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 国立京都国際会館は駅の南側にある。
sen.e: Kyoto International Conference Center is loacted on the south side of this station.
Kyoto International Conference Center is loacted on the south side of this station.
Kyoto International Conference Center is located on the south side of this station.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: その周辺は宝ヶ池公園であり、グランドプリンスホテルも近い。
sen.e: Around the station, Takaragaike Park is situated and Grand Prince Hotel is also located nearby.
Takaragaike Park and Grand Prince Hotel are located nearby.
Takaragaike Park and Grand Prince Hotel are located nearby.

sen.j: 駅北側と東側は新しい住宅地である（岩倉地区は市街化調整区域のため、高層マンションなどの大規模開発は出来ず、一戸建て住宅と低層集合住宅が中心となっている）。
sen.e: New housing areas are situated on the north and east sides (because they are included in urbanization-restricted areas, construction of large-scale developments, such ashigh-risecondominiums, is prohibited and detached houses or low-rise housing complexes are mostly built there).

New housing areas are situated on the north and east sides (because they're included in urbanization-restricted areas, the construction of large-scale developments, such as high-rise condominiums, is prohibited and detached houses or low-rise housing complexes predominate there).

New housing areas are situated on the north and east sides (because they're included in urbanization-restricted areas, the construction of large-scale developments, such as high-rise condominiums, is prohibited and detached houses or low-rise housing complexes predominate there).

sen.j: 駅の北、宝ヶ池通を挟んで同志社高等学校がある。
sen.e: In the north of this station, Doshisha High School is located across Takaragaike-dori Street.
Doshisha High School is located north of the station, across Takaragaike-dori Street.
Doshisha High School is located north of the station, across Takaragaike-dori Street.

sen.j: 宝ヶ池通沿いには郊外型の店舗が見られる。
sen.e: Suburban-type stores are found along Takaragaike-dori Street.
Suburban-type stores are found along Takaragaike-dori Street.
Suburban-type stores are found along Takaragaike-dori Street.

sen.j: また、やや距離はあるが、叡山電鉄鞍馬線岩倉駅 (京都府)も徒歩圏内である（北へ約10分程度）。
sen.e: Located a bit distantly, Iwakura Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) on the Kurama Line, operated by Eizan-dentetsu (Eizan Electric Railway), is within a walking distance.
Iwakura Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) on the Kurama Line, operated by Eizan-dentetsu (Eizan Electric Railway), is a bit distant but still reachable on foot.
Iwakura Station (Kyoto Prefecture) on the Kurama Line, operated by Eizan Electric Railway, is a bit distant but still reachable on foot (about 10-minute walk to the north).
sen.cmt: 括弧内のlocated in を削除しました。Eizan dentetsuは削除しました。翻訳を追加しました。

sen.j: 駅前の通りを東に行くと叡山電鉄鞍馬線八幡前駅 (京都府)がある。
sen.e: Going to the east along the road in front of the station, you can reach Hachiman-mae Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) on the Kurama Line, operated by Eizan-dentetsu (Eizan Electric Railway).
Going to the east along the road in front of the station, one can reach Hachiman-mae Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) on the Kurama Line, operated by Eizan-dentetsu (Eizan Electric Railway).
Going to the east along the road in front of the station, one can reach Hachiman-mae Station (Kyoto Prefecture) on the Kurama Line, operated by Eizan Electric Railway.
sen.cmt: 括弧内のlocated in を削除しました。Eizan dentetsuは削除しました。

sen.j: 円通寺 (京都市) 西へ1.5km
sen.e: Entsu-ji Temple (located in Kyoto Prefecture) is located at 1.5 km west of the station.
Entsu-ji Temple (located in Kyoto Prefecture) is located 1.5 km west of the station.
Entsu-ji Temple (Kyoto Prefecture) is located 1.5 km west of the station.
sen.cmt: 括弧内のlocated in を削除しました。

sen.j: 岩倉地区のバスターミナル
sen.e: Bus terminals in the Iwakura area
Bus terminals in the Iwakura area
Bus terminals in the Iwakura area

sen.j: 駅の地上部分には開業時に整備されたタクシー乗り場・バスターミナルが存在し、住宅地となっている岩倉方面や大原 (京都)方面への京都バス各路線の始終着点ともなっている（京都市営バスから移管された路線もある。
sen.e: On the ground level above the station, a taxi terminal and a bus terminal were established when the station started its operation, providing terminal functions for buses on Kyoto Bus routes in the directions of the Iwakura and Ohara (Kyoto Prefecture) areas (there are also the routes transferred from Kyoto City Bus, and

On the ground level above the station, a taxi terminal and bus terminal were established when the station became operational, and provided terminal functions for buses on Kyoto Bus routes in the directions of Iwakura and Ohara (Kyoto Prefecture) (there are also routes transferred from Kyoto City Bus, and

On the ground level above the station, a taxi terminal and bus terminal were established when the station became operational, and provided terminal functions for buses on Kyoto Bus routes in the directions of Iwakura and Ohara (Kyoto Prefecture) (there are also routes transferred from Kyoto City Bus;
sen.cmt: 最後のand を削除しました。

sen.j: 現在でも駅西側にある岩倉操車場始発の市バス路線が経由する）。
sen.e: even at present, buses on a city bus route starting at Iwakura Soshajo (bus yard), placed on the west side of this station, stop here).
even at present, buses on a city bus route starting at Iwakura Soshajo (bus yard), placed on the west side of this station, stop here).
even at present, buses on a city bus route starting at Iwakura Soshajo (bus yard), placed on the west side of this station, stop here).

sen.j: 観光シーズンには、都心部での渋滞や混雑を回避する為に、この駅発着の路線バスを利用する乗客も目立つ。
sen.e: In sight-seeing seasons, conspicuously many persons use buses starting from or arriving at this terminal, to avoid congestion in the central area of Kyoto.
In the tourist seasons, significant numbers of people use buses starting from or arriving at this terminal in order to avoid the congestion in central Kyoto.
In the tourist seasons, significant numbers of people use buses arriving at and departing from this terminal in order to avoid the congestion in central Kyoto.
sen.cmt: "starting from and terminating at" -> "arriving at and departing from" に変更しました。

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年）6月3日 烏丸線 国際会館-北山間の開通とともに開業。
sen.e: June 3, 1997: Operation of this station started when the Karasuma Line started its operation between Kokusai Kaikan and Kitayama.
June 3, 1997: This station became active when the Karasuma Line started operating between Kokusai Kaikan and Kitayama.
June 3, 1997: This station became active when the Karasuma Line started operating between Kokusaikaikan and Kitayama.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: April 1, 2007, PiTaPa became usable.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became accepted
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became accepted

sen.j: 第3回近畿の駅百選選定駅である。
sen.e: This station was selected in the third event for a selection of 100 prominent stations in the Kinki region.
This station was chosen in the third event to select 100 prominent stations in the Kinki region.
This station was chosen in the third event to select 100 prominent stations in the Kinki region.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄
sen.e: Kyoto City Subway
Kyoto City Subway

sen.e: ■ Karasuma Line

sen.j: 国際会館駅(K01) - 松ヶ崎駅 (京都府)(K02)
sen.e: Kokusai Kaikan Station (K01) - Matsugasaki Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) (K02)
Kokusai Kaikan Station (K01) - Matsugasaki Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) (K02)
